message.1:
It seems that you are not logged in!
Simply login with osu! and you can start voting/nominating immediately!
message.2:
You may login on discord in addition as well after, but it is not required to vote/nominate.
Discord login is required for staff members working on MCA/AYIM.

login.authOsu: click here to authenticate with osu!
login.authDiscord: click here to authenticate with discord

message.1: Mapper's Choice Awards is back for round 4 in 2019! This is a voting event where all mappers/modders can nominate and vote what they think is the best map/mapper for each category!
message.2: Our intention is to give a new perspective on the best maps of 2019 through the eyes of the mapping community in comparison to Community Choice!
message.3: This year, we have gone full-on with a website so that we can make it as easy as possible for eligible voters to nominate and vote now!
message.4: We hope as many participants as possible take part in this event!
